title: Does anyone miss taunt spamming?

replies.body: I think you misspelt Garens taunt

cum,cum,cum,cum

{{champion:74}} "Don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don-don't worry! You can learn so much from failure!"

Was literally the best part of playing Heimer.
I thought the best part was the swag walk

Really, that's the only reason I liked to player Heimerdinger. Such a huge nerf when Riot removed emote-spam.
Try Godfist Lee Sin's taunt spam, it's top tier emote spam :D

So Lee Sin can have taunt spam?

WHY I AM NOT SURPRISED
You gotta pay the big bucks for premium taunt spams LUL :^)
You might also say it's *god tier*.
bring back the emote spam pls, i miss spamming my taunt/joke as Nasus and Garen
My favorite kind of spam is the ones that are just silly to watch, like Pool Party Renekton's recall or Zed's Laugh.

muting someone does mute all champ emotes.

It doesn't mute nonvocal sounds that accompany emotes though. Such as the machine sound that goes with Rumble laugh, Super Galaxy Rumble, Spirit Guard Udyr, or the rattling of mini!Gnar's dance. Presumably because they fall under Sound FX rather than Voice.
Oh never realized that thanks for the info.

Stupid that they got rid of it >(  

It nerfed Garen and Heimerdinger too hard.
